title: Add 3D service/niche icons and improve checkout redirect to payment options

requirements.text: Add a 3D icon system for Services and Niches, and render the appropriate 3D icon consistently across the UI wherever a service or niche is shown (at minimum: Services page service cards, Service Details dialog header area, Services & Pricing page category/tier cards, and any niche labels/filters where present). Include a safe fallback icon when no specific icon exists for a given service/niche value.

quotes: add 3D icons for every service & niche

acceptanceCriteria: Services page cards show a 3D icon alongside each service (or a default 3D icon when no mapping exists).
ServiceDetailsDialog shows a 3D icon for the selected service in the header area (or default).
ServicesPricingPage shows a 3D icon for each of the 5 service categories and for Monthly Maintenance (or default).
Niche labels/filters (wherever they appear) display a mapped 3D icon (or default) without breaking layout on mobile.
All new icons are served as frontend static assets and rendered via the existing SafeImage component (or equivalent graceful fallback), so broken images do not show a browser broken-image icon.

requirements.text: Update the checkout flow so that when the Checkout dialog opens from any entry point (Services page or Services & Pricing page), the user is immediately guided/redirected to the payment options area, and after an order is created the dialog automatically brings the payment instructions (UPI/Razorpay/Stripe) into view for the selected payment method.

quotes: redirect to payment options in checkout page for payments

acceptanceCriteria: Opening CheckoutDialog automatically scrolls/focuses to the “Select Payment Method” section (payment options) without requiring manual scrolling.
After a successful “Create Order”, the dialog automatically scrolls/focuses to the payment instructions section for the currently selected method.
The behavior works for both ServicesPage checkout entry and ServicesPricingPage checkout entry, without changing backend APIs.
No user-facing text related to checkout becomes non-English as part of these changes.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components are read-only and must be composed).
Do not change authentication approach or add new auth providers (Internet Identity remains as-is; app already supports no-sign-in mode).
Do not introduce new backend canisters or external databases; keep the single-actor Motoko backend unchanged unless strictly required.
nonGoals: Implementing real-time payment confirmation (webhooks, polling gateways, or automatic status reconciliation) is out of scope.
Creating unique bespoke 3D artwork for every individual custom service record name is out of scope; icons should be mapped by service category/type/subtype and niche, with a robust default fallback.
